name: The Great Fossil Fetch! Name Your Prize
name_original: The Great Fossil Fetch! Name Your Prize
description:
Note: The downloadable version of this game only supports the standard 16:9 aspect ratio. If your monitor does not support 16:9 ratios please use the WebGL version we have embedded into this page (but do be aware that there might be slight delays with in-game audio due to how itch and Unity handle large audio files). Otherwise, download the game. If the WebGL build seems too zoomed in, try zooming out your browser window and see if that fixes it.

Controls:

  • A - Walk Left
  • D - Walk Right
  • SPACE - Jump
  • ESC - Menu/Inventory

Fonts Used:

  • Air Americana - Tiago Sá
  • Hobby Horse NF - Nick Curtis

If you feel that the game is too hard, there is a toggle in the SYSTEM menu called "Safe Mode" that will put you into god mode in order for you to beat the game. To turn off safe mode, click on the "Normal Mode" button in the same area.

Here are all of the attacks in the game as our gameplay video does not showcase all of them.
